WorkflowInfo.Name: Kill stuck process
WorkflowInfo.Description: Kill stuck process by checking its memory usage
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process retrieves the information of a specific service, and checks for the memory usage in 1 minute interval. If the data is equal, the process is assumed to be stuck and killed.
WorkflowInfo.XML: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:ProcessList;Assembly=ProcessList, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:GetRows;Assembly=GetRows, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:Wait;Assembly=Wait, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:ResultSetFilter;Assembly=ResultSetFilter, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns7="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns8="clr-namespace:ProcessKill;Assembly=ProcessKill, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><ns0:ProcessList IsValid="True" x:Name="processList1" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="LocalHost" DisplayName="Process List" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Get the list of processes on the specified host" HostId="1" TypeName="ProcessList" UserName="" /><ns1:GetRows RowNumber="" x:Name="getRows1" HostName="{x:Null}" RowContains="Process_Name" ResultSet="%processList1%" Timeout="00:01:00" IsValid="True" isRowNumber="1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Get Rows" ResultSetName="processList1" TimeInSeconds="0" Description="Gets specified rows from a resultset." HostId="0" TypeName="GetRows" /><ns2:Wait IsValid="True" x:Name="wait1" TimeInterval="" isDefault="0" DisplayName="Wait" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Pause workflow" TypeName="Wait" TimeValue="" Timeout="00:01:00" /><ns0:ProcessList IsValid="True" x:Name="processList2" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="LocalHost" DisplayName="Process List" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Get the list of processes on the specified host" HostId="1" TypeName="ProcessList" UserName="" /><ns1:GetRows RowNumber="" x:Name="getRows2" HostName="{x:Null}" RowContains="Process_Name" ResultSet="%processList2%" Timeout="00:01:00" IsValid="True" isRowNumber="1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Get Rows" ResultSetName="processList2" TimeInSeconds="0" Description="Gets specified rows from a resultset." HostId="0" TypeName="GetRows" /><ns3:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%getRows2%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="getRows2" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /><WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" Condition="{x:Null}"><SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"><ns4:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%getRowsCount1%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /><ns5:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="ProcessID" ColumnNumber="3" ResultSet="%getRows2%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="getRows2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /><ns6:ResultSetFilter IsValid="True" x:Name="filter1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="ResultSet Filter" VariableName="%processList1%" Description="Filter a Result Set" TypeName="ResultSetFilter" FilterStatement="IDProcess = %ProcessID%" /><ns5:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="PrevMemory" ColumnNumber="3" ResultSet="%filter1%" RowNumber="1" ResultSetName="filter1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /><ns5:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="CurrentMemory" ColumnNumber="4" ResultSet="%getRows2%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="getRows2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /><IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity1"><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity1"><ns7:ReturnValue Value="%PrevMemory%" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="Equals" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals("&&&","%PrevMemory%")" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /><ns8:ProcessKill IsValid="True" x:Name="processKill1" HostName="LocalHost" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Kill Process" isProcessName="1" Password="" ProcessPID="%ProcessID%" Description="Terminate the selected process." HostId="1" TypeName="ProcessKill" UserName="" ProcessName="" /></IfElseBranchActivity><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity2"><ns7:ReturnValue Value="%PrevMemory%" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="Not Equals" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Not Equals("&&&","%PrevMemory%")" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /></IfElseBranchActivity></IfElseActivity></SequenceActivity></WhileActivity></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
